Public Remarks: Completely Remodeled Ranch home just minutes to Downtown. Minutes to Restaurants and Parks in a quiet neighborhood. This home has been remodeled from top to bottom. The main floor is bright and open with ample natural light throughout the Open Concept Kitchen with an eat-in Dining Space, and plenty of storage. The main floor has a full bath off the bedrooms and beautiful, new flooring throughout. The Basement has an Additional two (non-conforming) bedrooms, a large laundry room, and a fully remodeled bath. The exterior has a large yard, storage shed, and New Exterior Paint. The garage is massive with plenty of room to park two cars, as well as the ability to have a work-shop space. Along with all new bathrooms, kitchen, flooring, light fixtures, new interior paint, this home had a new roof put on only three years ago, and has a working irrigation system. This is truly a turn-key property where a buyer can sit back and relax.

Come see amazing 4 bedroom, 2 bath brick ranch home with a finished basement that offers many upgrades throughout and many extras features. As you walk up, you will notice the well maintained and adorned front yard. As you enter the home, you will notice the large open dining/living area with an oversized window that fills the space with plenty of morning & afternoon light. Both bathrooms have been upgraded with new showers and flooring (main level). Kitchen has upgraded countertops, plenty of cabinet space, less than a year old LG SS Refrigerator.  Main level also offers 3 additional bonus rooms. Right off the kitchen, an extra bonus room that you can use as a storage room, additional office or as it's currently used as a kennel area for you loved furry friends. Second additional room, sunroom that can have many uses. Third additional room, great for extra storage with refrigerator. In basement, you have an additional living space/family room for entertainment. Two basement bedrooms, with egress windows, full bathroom and laundry room. This property also offers a great, low maintenance back yard, with turf grass, & a Gazebo ideal for entertaining family and friends. The garage is oversized (34 L X 25 W) that can fit large vehicles, insulated, work benches, wired with 220v and extra storage above in the attic in the garage. Also offers additional Shed measuring 10X10. Driveway on the garage side can fit 4 or more cars and driveway on the other side of the property is for your toys or RV home. **Newer Water Heater, New Furnace, Gutters and New A/C. In 2012, replaced windows on the main floor and installed sprinkler system in the front yard. All plumbing has been upgraded to copper, electrical box upgraded and new insulation in the attic. *No HOA* Close to schools, shops, restaurants & transportation
